verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I find each day new victory, When Jesus has control, And blessings that are sent to me, When Jesus has control.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: When Jesus has control, When Jesus has control; He leads the way from day to day, When Jesus has control.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I find new joys unknown before, When Jesus has control, And peace abiding more and more, When Jesus has control.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I find new strength to conquer wrong, When Jesus has control, And blessings with the victor’s song, When Jesus has control.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I find new light upon my way, When Jesus has control, To light and guide me day by day, When Jesus has control.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I look beyond life’s unknown sea, When Jesus has control, And see the Homeland waiting me, When Jesus has control.
